lenders.name: Elsa
lenders.loan_because: I know the impact that only 25 dollars can make on lifes that often make less than $1 a day !... But more importantly, I wish to share more then money, I wish to share something much more valuable and that is INFORMATION - especially to those dealing with our very life´s sustainance: AGRICULTURE
lenders.occupational_info:
Millions of farmers are bamboozled by the new "fools gold" by the big Agribusiness, such as the new genetically engineered crops, that promise miracle yields and easy times for the farmers that are tricked into trusting the big agribusiness that actually only care about their own immediate profit. 
I have been wanting to join KIVA for a long time and now that I have, I can`t help but worry about how the agricultural initiatives that some of the local developmental agencies  support when it comes to byuing seed, for not knowing wht they´re getting into...and the temptations that farmers may be exposed to by the alluring marketing mechanisms like the ones that have been deployed in India to convince farmers to no longer grow organic, or save their own seed, and give it all up for BT crops instead - since they´re erroneously promised to be the holy grail of seeds. Publicity and marketing strategies promoted by corporations such as Monsanto, Syngenta, Pioneer, etc, have convinced many people around the world to take up their advice and products, and countries like India have seen a suicide rate in the many thousands a year, directly related to the Genetically Modified Crops and the vicious cycle of debt they introduce in every country they manage to lie their way into! http://www.celsias.com/article/how-gm-seeds-killed-more-indians-world-war-ii/
http://www.nowpublic.com/environment/farmer-suicide-belt-india.
So, while I am very excited about the idea of contributing to a better world and do believe we can change it faster than ever possible before through instruments like the micro-credits and peer-to-peer initiatives via the Internet, I am deeply concerned about how those funds are going to be invested. Whether they will go toward sustainable systems of self-sufficiency and self-empowerment, through the strengthening of systems that have worked for thousands of years, including organic farming and seed saving traditions, or whether the funds will go towards further indebtedness of the families who are requesting these funds through the purchase of GM seeds. 
I beg of you that you please, please, please read and distribute information such as the one found in the link mentioned above as well as the ones that follow, so that we will not see another Green Revolution in Africa, like the one we have been seeing in India and the devastating consequences that come with it.
 Thank you so much for bearing with me as I dragged you across a really long but very important message... In the meantime, I wish all the success in the world with your projects and I leave you much love from Portugal,
Elsa
http://globalcitizenjourney.org/green-team/agra-watch/agra-watch-resources/

lenders.name: Acorn Academy
lenders.loan_because: Our family wants to do what we can to help people's lives in countries that do not currently provide the same opportunities that we have in the United States.  We have decided to focus mainly on Sub-Saharan West Africa, and also with products that can directly help the community.
lenders.occupational_info: Writer, Investor

lenders.name: RICHARD
lenders.loan_because: not everything should be for profit.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: Being female, a mother, Black AND in Africa is difficult enough.  Any help in life would, I am sure, be welcome especially if it's to help educate a child.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother and I'm Black.  Even if I'm not in Africa, life is difficult for me too but we're all in this together.

lenders.occupational_info: I am trying to help people discover God in their own personal way on their journey in life!

lenders.name: charles (jeff)

lenders.name: Kim

lenders.occupational_info: I take care of computer networks for a U.S. company.

lenders.name: Pong

lenders.name: Wholely Leaping Sharks!
lenders.loan_because:
Thanks to our excellent friends who donated to this portfolio!   We continue our idiosyncratic loan bias to bicycles, chickens, cows, bees, women, group loans, and the rural Philippines.  
We are concerned about the over-availability of micro-finance in some communities and are sensitive to evidence of loan rollovers.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in new technologies, which are so specialized and obscure we struggle to even explain them to our families.

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: God is good

lenders.name: Andreina
lenders.loan_because: I believe in changing the world one step at a time.

lenders.name: Mac
lenders.loan_because: I believe many of our world's problems can be solved , or at least improved, through the opportunity to be a part of a small business.  I believe that such endeavors create hope for the future of those involved in their local community.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner and am compelled to assist others in getting a chance to make it.
lenders.occupational_info: my company cleans up contaminated sites to make our Earth a cleaner place.

lenders.name: Shailaja & Ashutosh
lenders.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I am deeply passionate about human rights issues, and I am especially concerned for persons and people groups who are so often forgotten by societies that place economic advantage and individual prosperity on a higher pedestal than protecting the human. Only by working together to build a stronger and more just global community, do I believe humanity has a chance to alleviate and overcome economic (and all other forms of) discrimination and injustice.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently studying to become an American lawyer, and I hope to work with low-income populations in the fields of worker protection, family rights, criminal defense, and immigration law.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I feel that the greatest change will come by helping people to help themselves.
